metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40871 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: Dolibarr ERP & CRM <=15.0.3 is vulnerable to Eval injection. By default,any administrator can be added to the installation page of dolibarr, and ifsuccessfully added, malicious code can be inserted into the database andthen execute it by eval.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
